# nk-heading



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                | Type                                     | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignment` | `alignment` | Text alignment for the header                                              | `"center" \| "end" \| "none" \| "start"` | `'none'`    |
| `level`     | `level`     | Header level. Use appropriate level according to the global header outline | `number`                                 | `undefined` |
| `text`      | `text`      | The text to show in the heading                                            | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
| `variant`   | `variant`   | Determines the header variant                                              | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
